name: Roame
headline: Flight search engine using credit card points and miles
description:
Roame is flight search engine design for credit card points and miles. We help travelers redeem their points for dream vacations in seconds rather than days.

At Roame, we are on a mission to revolutionize travel and consumer finance. We stand at the intersection of travel tech and fintech.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:travel; industry:airlines; industry:consumer-finance; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Tim Qin, Founder
founders.description:
Tim (CEO) started his career as an engineer at Lockheed Martin. Over the last few years, he has invested billions of dollars in internet travel and financial services companies while working at UBS Asset Management, Fidelity, and Affiliated Managers Group. Tim studied engineering at Columbia University and received an MBA from Harvard Business School.

For investment inquiries: tim@roame.travel

founders.name: Zi Liu, Founder
founders.description: Zi (CTO) ran all of Airbnb’s encryption services, creating and managing billions of cryptographic requests from payments vaulting to healthcare data. He started his career in Machine Vision AI processing at the Department of Defense in Oak Ridge. Zi studied computer science at Dartmouth.

generated_description:
### Roame: Turning Points into Vacations

**Overview**  
Roame is an innovative flight search engine based in San Francisco, established in 2023 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S23. This startup is less about planes and more about optimizing how travelers redeem their credit card points and frequent flyer miles for dream vacations, streamlining the cumbersome process from days of searching to just seconds.

**Mission**  
Their mission? To revolutionize the intersection of travel technology and consumer finance. Roame helps unlock the full potential of credit card rewards for users, allowing them to book their flights and travel experiences quickly and effectively.

**Team & Influence**  
With just a four-person team, Roame is a lean operation but with substantial backing from notable venture capitalist Aaron Epstein as a Group Partner. This structure suggests a focused, agile team ready to adapt and innovate in the rapidly changing landscape of travel technology.

**Core Features & Services**  
- **Easy Flight Search**: Roame allows users to search for flights through a user-friendly interface that maximizes the value of their points.
- **Membership Service**: It offers a membership option that provides access to exclusive flight deals and discounts.
- **SkyView & Tools**: Users can utilize the SkyView feature for planning trips and accessing various tools that aid in maximizing the use of rewards.

**Target Market**  
Roame's user base includes frequent travelers eager to make the most of their credit card points, alongside leisure travelers looking for cost-effective ways to fulfill their travel dreams. By tapping into AI and SaaS technology, they meet the demands of a growing audience that values quick, efficient travel planning.

**Vision for the Future**  
As Roame continues to expand its services, it aims to further simplify the travel booking process, potentially incorporating more features that allow users to connect with their dream destinations more easily. This could include collaborations with airlines and other travel service providers to create a more seamless experience for consumers.

**Website**  
For more information, flight deals, and services, check out [Roame](https://roame.travel/).
